payload.text: One of our consultants will be able to assist you. If you would like to chat with one of our consultants please select 'Chat with consultant' button.

You are able to add or amend a client's TFN by following these steps:
1. Select 'Account details' in the navigation menu of the client's account
2. Select the client's underlined name
3. Select the pencil icon next to 'Tax file number'
